SEARCH
Package Service

Class DoctorService

Object
UserService<Doctor,DoctorRepository>
DoctorService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IService<Doctor,DoctorRepository>
public class DoctorService extends UserService<Doctor,DoctorRepository>
Service class for doctor-specific operations. Extends UserService to provide functionalities such as managing appointments, updating diagnoses, and accessing patient records.

    • acceptAppointment

      public void acceptAppointment(String appointmentId)
      Accepts a pending appointment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment to accept.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the appointment does not belong to the current doctor.
      IllegalStateException - if the appointment is not in a pending state.

    • declineAppointment

      public void declineAppointment(String appointmentId)
      Declines a pending appointment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment to decline.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the appointment does not belong to the current doctor.
      IllegalStateException - if the appointment is not in a pending state.

    • completeAppointment

      public void completeAppointment(String appointmentId, AppointmentOutcomeRecord aor)
      Completes an appointment by attaching an appointment outcome record (AOR) to it.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment to complete.
      aor - the appointment outcome record to attach to the appointment.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the appointment does not belong to the current doctor.

    • addNewDiagnosis

      public void addNewDiagnosis(String patientId, String diagnosis)
      Adds a new diagnosis to a patient's medical record.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the ID of the patient.
      diagnosis - the diagnosis to add.
